con:testStep.name: REST Request for Generate Access Token

con:restRequest.name: REST Request for Generate Access Token

con:testStep.name: script to store access token at project level

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.responseHeaders def response1 = messageExchange.response.responseContent log.info response log.info response1
def status = response["#status#"]
log.info status
def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response1) def name = holder.data.username
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.responseHeaders log.info response def status = response["#status#"] log.info status

con:config.script:
import jxl.* def filepath = "/REST Project_TC_021_Login Creds.xls" File Excel = new File(filepath) Workbook wb = Workbook.getWorkbook(Excel) Sheet sh = wb.getSheet("Sheet1") String username1 = sh.getCell('A1').getContents() String password1 = sh.getCell('B1').getContents() log.info username1 log.info password1
def username = context.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["TestSuite 1"].testCases["TC_021_GetListOfProducts by limit parameter"].testSteps["Login Properties"].setPropertyValue("username",username1) def password = context.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["TestSuite 1"].testCases["TC_021_GetListOfProducts by limit parameter"].testSteps["Login Properties"].setPropertyValue("password",password1)

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.responseHeaders log.info response
def status = response["#status#"] log.info status def limit = response["X-Pagination-Limit"] log.info limit def expectedlimit = ["2"] assert limit == expectedlimit

con:restRequest.name: AddNewProductToStore

con:config.script:
import jxl.* def filepath = "/REST Project_Product.xls" File Excel = new File(filepath) Workbook wb = Workbook.getWorkbook(Excel) Sheet sh = wb.getSheet("Sheet2") String UpdatedPrice = sh.getCell('A1').getContents() log.info UpdatedPrice
def price = context.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["TestSuite 1"].testCases["TC_022_AddNewProduct_Modify"].testSteps["Product Properties"].setPropertyValue("updateprice",UpdatedPrice)

con:restRequest.name: UpdateProductById

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.responseHeaders def response1 =messageExchange.response.responseContent log.info response
def status = response["#status#"] log.info status
def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response1) def name = holder.data.price

con:testCase.name: TC_023_GetListOfProducts and Update Mul products to Store

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("GetListOfAllProducts").getPropertyValue("response")
log.info response
def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) log.info holder def product_id = holder.data.id log.info product_id log.info product_id[5]

con:restRequest.name: UpdateMulProductsToStore

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.responseHeaders def response1 =messageExchange.response.responseContent log.info response
def status = response["#status#"] log.info status def expectedStatus="[HTTP/1.1 200 OK]" //assert status==expectedStatus
def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response1) def price = holder.data.price def actualPrice = price[10] def expectedPrice =44 assert actualPrice == expectedPrice def product_id = holder.data.id log.info product_id def actualProduct_id=product_id[10] def expectedProduct_id=100
